title: Two European Telcos Leveraging Cloudify by GigaSpaces for Network Agility Via Pure-Play Orchestration
text:
New case study outlines how two EU-based telcos are using open-source Cloudify for the automation of virtualized network functions (VNFs).
BARCELONA, Spain (PRWEB) October 12, 2015
GigaSpaces Technologies, a provider of cloud orchestration technologies, today released a case study outlining how two European telcos are using Cloudify as an open orchestration platform for network functions virtualization (NFV).
The Cloudify team will discuss these use cases at VMworld Europe in Barcelona, October 12-15. The company will exhibit in the NFV pavilion at booth NFV 3068. The case study is available at the Cloudify website .
The integration between Cloudify and VMware provides an open NFV orchestration service through its Open Service Blueprinting, using TOSCA, as well as open infrastructure supporting both OpenStack and vCloud, enabling real world hybrid environments.
Case Study Overview
At both telcos featured in the case study, the process of onboarding their VNF applications was largely manual, taking months or even years to implement and introducing the risk of human error. One telco was seeking a single orchestration platform to manage all their core network services such as LDAP and IMS on top of OpenStack infrastructure and IPv6. The other was looking for an open orchestration platform that would work across existing VMware infrastructure as well as their new OpenStack infrastructure.
Both companies looked to other powerful orchestrators common to the telco data center, from OSS/BSS orchestration and network orchestration to OpenStack HEAT and others. Ultimately, both chose Cloudify because it is the only orchestration service that supports IPv6, and it comes with native support for OpenStack and VMware, coupled with additional support for TOSCA and YANG. This makes Cloudify a true open and mature NFV Orchestration, which was another key selection criteria.
About GigaSpaces
GigaSpaces Technologies provides software for cloud application orchestration and scaling of mission-critical applications on cloud environments. Hundreds of tier-one organizations worldwide—including top financial firms, e-commerce companies, online gaming providers, healthcare organizations and telecom carriers—are leveraging GigaSpaces technology to enhance IT efficiency and performance. GigaSpaces has offices in the US, Europe and Asia. More at http://www.gigaspaces.com and getcloudify.org
